ðŸ“– Summary: The c/ua repository provides a Docker container environment for Computer-Use AI Agents, allowing them to control full operating systems. It supports both local and cloud deployment, offering a quick-start Docker-based installation and a Dev Container configuration for development. This enables users to automate desktop tasks with AI agents in a controlled and scalable manner.
